info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 5 days ago,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
For my trip to Bangladesh, I couldn't have asked for a better Airbnb experience! The location is absolutely perfect. The neighborhood is quiet and noise-free, which made it easy to relax after a day of exploring.
The best part was how convenient everything was, with so many great restaurants nearby, and a beautiful park close by. Plus, the surrounding streets are great for just roaming around and soaking in the local culture.
The place itself was clean, and the host was super friendly and helpful, making sure I had everything I needed. I felt safe and at home throughout my stay. I highly recommend this Airbnb for anyone visiting Dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Khaled was very helpful accomodatimg with a late checkin, and some alterations in our reservation. The place was very peaceful, and I enjoyed watching the rain sitting in my room.
This type of old model house is a rare find.
This is my favorite airbnb in Dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: I had a fantastic stay at this Airbnb hosted by a friendly host. The house has an old rustic charm, and the area was surprisingly undisturbed and quiet. Highly recommended for a good night's sleep.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: I recently revisited Khaled's Airbnb, my second visit. I must say it remains a tranquil environment in the bustling center of Gulshan. The peaceful atmosphere, surrounded by trees, creates a serene atmosphere that's a rare gem in Dhaka. They helped with the laundry and the cooking as well. Truly very friendly hosts. Khaled and the team continued to go above and beyond to accommodate my needs.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: I'm a lady in my mid-70s. When in BD I always rent Airbnbs. Khaled's place is a rare find in Dhaka. With trees all around it's so quiet and peaceful, hard to believe this is the heart of Gulshan. They went out of their way to provide whatever i needed. Wishing them all the best.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Simply stunning hospitality

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · March 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Khaled and local host Rumana were very responsive, kind and helpful. The apartment was basic but functional. The kitchen could be completed with a few more essential items. The tea, coffee and snacks on arrival was much appreciated. It is great to wake up and see trees, and in a city like Dhaka this is a rare treat. A bit of maintenance, especially on the balcony space, and fixing things like doors and locks, and the place could be fabulous.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Mr. Khaled & the Co-Host Ms. Romana is amazing, their communication was spot on. The place is with an ethnic surrounding. All the amenities are nicer. BBQ Arrangement in rooftop & the view is just heavenly.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: As always a splendid host in this city and I’d definitely choose his place anytime I’m in Dhaka, no questions. The very best you can get.
